Extrude the sketch by 0.0382 units along the positive Z-axis. **Part 2: Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. This line will complete the rectangular loop. *Extruding Face 1:* 1. Scale the sketch by 0.0762. 2. Extrude the sketch by 0.1195 units along the positive Z-axis. *Combining Parts:* 1. Perform a join operation between part 1 and part 2. **Final Shape:** A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height.</description>
